safetyTips: Contactless deliveries or collections Please enquire directly about other safety measures.
name: Lillyroos Breakfasts
description: Lillyroos Breakfasts…….now available for delivery to the CT14 postcode between 8am and 12 midday.  We use only fresh produce from our local suppliers, and everything is made fresh to order.  You can choose to collect if you happen to be passing, using social distancing protocols from the entrance gate. Then walk it off through the local reserve .......  Coffees are made using freshly ground coffee beans with plant-based milk an option.  All payments will be contactless over the phone with a minimum order of £10 for deliveries.  Monday to Friday orders can be placed anytime. Saturday and Sunday orders need to be placed by 8pm the previous day prior to delivery date.
